name: Add example for a new record with the word to Google sheets
description:
Every time a new row with a word is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically get the word definition from Urban Dictionary and update a row with this word in Google Sheets.
The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dxcHKBJkooS3hZMYcfDC_C5c2i7sfj9E5msRwZmhae0/edit?usp=sharing).
